item.description:
"Why role your own? Installing and using PEAR/PECL." This presentation will explore/discuss the PHP Extension and Application Repository (PEAR) and PHP Extension Code Library (PECL). Two valuable resources available to the PHP community.

Orange is handicap accessible, but for the life of me I can't figure out how to edit the venue information on the meetup site. Sorry, technology was never my strong suit ;-)

For more information, see http://www.orange.us/...
item.name: Boston PHP Meetup March Meetup
